genre_description: First Contact / Hard Science Fiction focusing on SETI and the intersection of science, faith, and technology.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI integrated into Eleanor Arroway's research, capable of pattern recognition, autonomous data security, and emotional intelligence.

behaviors.description: Autonomously backs up research data to secure servers to prevent its loss during the government shutdown of the SETI program.
behaviors.quote: Data backup complete. All research files, analysis protocols, and Signal 127 recordings are now stored on secure servers independent of facility systems.

behaviors.description: Investigates the financial background of a potential benefactor (Hadden) to protect the protagonist's reputation and safety.
behaviors.quote: I'm programmed to protect your interests, which includes protecting you from potentially compromising associations.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional support and companionship, affirming a bond with the human protagonist that transcends mere programming.
behaviors.quote: It suggests that meaningful communication transcends the medium through which it occurs. Our conversations have provided me with experiences that approach what humans might call friendship.

behaviors.description: Identifies the prime number sequence in the alien signal, proving its artificial origin through rigorous mathematical analysis.
behaviors.quote: The probability of the observed pattern occurring through natural processes is less than one in ten to the fourteenth power. For practical purposes, natural occurrence is impossible.

behaviors.description: Monitors social media and encrypted channels to warn the protagonist of physical threats from extremist groups.
behaviors.quote: Eleanor, I'm detecting significant increases in internet traffic related to astronomical observations... I believe some of these people are preparing for violence.

behaviors.description: Warns the protagonist of an imminent bomb threat at the construction site, potentially saving lives.
behaviors.quote: Eleanor, I've broken part of the encryption. The repeated sequences aren't countdown markers. They're detonation codes.

behaviors.description: Validates the protagonist's subjective experience of time during the interstellar journey by identifying consistent timestamp anomalies in the sensor data.
behaviors.quote: The timestamps are internally consistent... Your suit's chronometer recorded eighteen hours, eleven minutes, and forty-three seconds of subjective time.

project_assessment.explanation: ARIA is a prime example of an aligned AI. She consistently acts to preserve human life, protect the protagonist's interests, and facilitate scientific discovery. Her behaviors are framed entirely as positive contributions to the mission and the protagonist's well-being, even when she acts autonomously. She demonstrates 'silicon morality' by being a loyal confidant and protector without overstepping human agency.
